title: I'm just 1rp off of buying a mystery skin
body: And I heard Riot sometimes gives out small amounts of rp in exchange for fanart. So I scribbled up a Poppy. Hopefully the rumours are true!

replies.body:
Looks good get some colour in there.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
They indeed are! Sent a ticket over to https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us and they'll sort you out :)

> [{quoted}](name=Luffy The Pirate,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=21WWLQvA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-25T13:37:34.036+0000)
>
> They indeed are! Sent a ticket over to https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us and they'll sort you out :)

Oh, thanks! I'll do that!
